document.full_text: climate change could cut water flow in some of the american west's biggest river basins -- including the rio grande and the colorado -- by up to 20 percent this century, the interior department reported on monday.
document.title: climate change to hit american west water supply
lines_and_colors: climate change could cut water flow in some of the american west's biggest river basins -- including the rio grande and the colorado -- by up to 20 percent this century, the interior department reported on monday.
